alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 29 at 7:48PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following counties, Glades and Hendry. * WHEN...Until 900 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 747 PM EDT, Doppler radar Doppler radar indicated that the thunderstorms have ended. However, 1 to 3 inches of rain have fallen over this area from the earlier thunderstorms and addition rainfall up to one inch can still occur over this area from the moderate rains. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Clewiston, Moore Haven, Lakeport, Buckhead Ridge, Brighton Seminole Reservation, Ortona, Port La Belle, Indian Prairie Canal Mouth and Lake Hicpochee. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
